root.title: moni fund issu 125 mln dlr eurobond
root.body: moni fund inc issu 125 mln dlr eurobond due april 7 1997 pay pct price 101-1/2 pct sole lead manag citicorp invest bank ltd say the non-cal bond guarante mutual life insur Co u. and avail denomin 5,000 dlr list luxembourg the sell concess pct manag underwrit combin pay 5/8 pct the payment date april 7
